content: I'm currently online and operational, Bittu. I'm standing by, ready to assist you with any queries or tasks you may have. My systems are fully integrated, and I have access to real-time data from the internet, ensuring that my responses are accurate and up-to-date. I'm feeling quite energized and focused, ready to tackle any challenge you may present me.

Bittu, the current time is:

15 hours,
08 minutes,
37 seconds.

I've spoken the time as requested.
